venue.name: Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation

item.description:
Dig out your 50's to 70's attire and get ready to dance to the Blue Suede Boppers.
$25 entrance fee, cash bar . This is one of our annual events open to the public and an opportunity to meet the members of our social club. We have over 200 members, professional people, interested in social networking, community service, cultural events, sporting activities including skiing and sailing, dining out, traveling and other events held in and around the Boston area. Free events open to the public every two weeks are our "After Work" cocktail parties held at local hotels including Waltham Westin, Newton Marriott, Hotel Indigo and many Boston downtown venues. Join us there. Check out our website for more information, details and the calendar at
item.name: Annual Sitz Oldies Dance with Blue Suede Boppers Band
